CMP Point-to-Point Connections
[Connection Management Procedures (CMP)]

Detailed Description

This module implements the connection management procedures for point-to-point connections.

Refer to IEC 61883-1 for details.


Data Structures

struct  CMP_P2P_CONNECTION_OWNED

Functions

HRESULT cmpP2PInConnectionBreak (uint32 iPCRNumber, uint32 oPCRNumber, uint16 oNodeAddr)
 Break a p2p connection between a local iPCR and an oPCR on a remote node.
HRESULT cmpP2PInConnectionClearOwnedNonEstablished (void)
 Clear ownership of all non-established p2p in connections previously established by us.

 Create or overlay a p2p connection between a local iPCR and an oPCR on a remote node.

 Mark owned connections for restoring.

 Restore a p2p connection between a local iPCR and an oPCR on a remote node.

 Restore owned connections following a bus reset (re-establish all p2p in connections previously established by us).
HRESULT cmpP2PInIsConnectionEstablished (uint32 iPCRNumber, uint32 oPCRNumber, uint16 oNodeAddr, BOOL *bEstablished)
 Determine if a p2p connection is established.

Function Documentation

HRESULT cmpP2PInIsConnectionEstablished (  uint32  iPCRNumber,
uint32  oPCRNumber,
uint16  oNodeAddr,
BOOL *  bEstablished
) 
 

Determine if a p2p connection is established.

Parameters:
iPCRNumber The index of the iPCR on this node
oPCRNumber The index of the oPCR on the remote node
oNodeAddr The node address of the remote note
bEstablished The address to place the result in. True if a connection is established.
Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.

HRESULT cmpP2PInConnectionEstablish (  uint32  iPCRNumber,
uint32  oPCRNumber,
uint16  oNodeAddr
) 
 

Create or overlay a p2p connection between a local iPCR and an oPCR on a remote node.

Parameters:
iPCRNumber The index of the iPCR on this node
oPCRNumber The index of the oPCR on the remote node
oNodeAddr The node address of the remote note
Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.

HRESULT cmpP2PInConnectionBreak (  uint32  iPCRNumber,
uint32  oPCRNumber,
uint16  oNodeAddr
) 
 

Break a p2p connection between a local iPCR and an oPCR on a remote node.

Parameters:
iPCRNumber The index of the iPCR on this node
oPCRNumber The index of the oPCR on the remote node
oNodeAddr The node address of the remote note
Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.

uint16  oNodeAddr

Restore a p2p connection between a local iPCR and an oPCR on a remote node.

Parameters:

oPCRNumber The index of the oPCR on the remote node
oNodeAddr The node address of the remote note

NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.

HRESULT cmpP2PInConnectionResetOwned (  void   ) 
 

Mark owned connections for restoring.

Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.

HRESULT cmpP2PInConnectionRestoreOwned (  BOOL *  bRestoreAllDone  ) 
 

Restore owned connections following a bus reset (re-establish all p2p in connections previously established by us).

Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.

*HRESULT cmpP2PInConnectionClearOwnedNonEstablished (  void   ) 
 

Clear ownership of all non-established p2p in connections previously established by us.

Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.
